title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.33 - Retention and updating
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.33 - Retention and updating

State Regulations
(a) The employer must save the SH 900 log, the privacy case list (if one exists), the annual summary, and the SH 900.2 incident report forms for five years
following the end of the calendar year that these records cover. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
801.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
